name: AVSampleBufferGenerator
desc: An object used to create sample buffer opaque objects.

items.name: init(asset: AVAsset, timebase: CMTimebase?)
items.desc: Creates a new sample buffer generator.

items.name: func createSampleBuffer(for: AVSampleBufferRequest) -> CMSampleBuffer?
items.desc: Creates a new sample buffer reference for the specified buffer request.

items.name: class func notifyOfDataReady(for: CMSampleBuffer, completionHandler: (Bool, Error) -> Void)
items.desc: Notifies the sample buffer generator when data is ready for the sample buffer reference or an error has occurred.
